me satan siyalla jaya gena dewana nidahas aragalaye dewani inima jayagrahanayen kelawara kirima apa rata hamuwe athi saba abhiyogayayi.bodu, kristhiyani, hindu ha muslim siyalu prajawata niwesa wu apa mathrubhumiya samruddhiya ha sarthakathwaya athkara ganima sandaha samayen perata ya yuthu bawa samastha lanka jamiyathul ulama sanwidhanaya nikuth kara athi nidahas dina paniwudaye sandahan we.ema paniwudaya meseya.pasugiya wasara 66 thula, laba gath nidahasa purna lesa bhukthi windime uthsahaye di apa ratata wiwidha abhiyoga ha anathuruwalata muhuna dimata sidu wiya.apa me nidahasa samaranuye dirgha ha winashakari yuddhayak awasan kara athi pasubimaka ha rata saubhagyaye ha sanwardhanaye mawathe idiriyata gena yama sandaha samayen ha samagiyen diwi gewimata sakala shri lankikayan aditan kota sitina mohothakayi.bodu, hindu, kristhiyani ha muslim athulu naika prajawalata niwasa wu apa mathrubhumiya samruddhiya ha sarthakathwaya ath karaganma sandaha samagriyen perata ya yuthu ya yanna apa ge pramukha yaduma da pathuma da wanne ya.janathawa siri lak mawage eka ma daru kalak men iwasimen ha anyonya sammuthiyen men ma wishwasayen da yuthu wa jiwath wana shri lankawak bihi wewa yi samastha lanka jamiyathul ulama sanwidhanaya pathanne ya.rate nidahasa ha rakawaranaya wenuwen diwi pidu siyalu edithara wiruwanta pranama dakwime hondama kramawedaya wanne merata eksathbawa saha samangiya sawimath kirima sandaha kapawana bawata aditan karaganima bawa rama krishna sabhawa pawasayi.shri lanka prajathanthrika samajawadi janarajaye 66 wana nidahas dinaya 2014 pebarawari 04 wani dina samarima sathutata karuneki.pebarawari 04 wani dina niyathayen ma sama siri lak wasiyekuta ma sathuta ha abimana sapiri dinayeki.
